name: Arato
description:
Arato is a NES style roguelike.  The goal of the game is to ascend the tower and obtain the scythe to become a full reaper.

~~CONTROLS~~

Arrow keys to move 

X to open menus/select

C to go back in the menus

~~ GAMEPLAY ~~

You can obtain melee weapons known as knifes, throwable forks, and armor. Using these plus randomized food you can ascend the reaper's tower
